head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HOWARD, DR. KENNETH I.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HOWARD, DR. KENNETH I.

block.p: HOWARD-Dr. Kenneth I. Noted Psychologist and Professor of Psychology at Northwestern University, Evanston, Illinois, at age 68. Husband of Sue Taylor Howard. Father of Matthew, Rebecca, David, Lisa, Peter and Deborah. Step-father of Kevin and Paul Merritt. Son of Simon and the late Florence. Brother of Robert Howard and Sharon Skolnik. Grandfather of eight. For additional information Weinstein Family Services 847-256-5700.
